alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 2:10PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison and central Onondaga Counties through 245 PM EST... At 209 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marcellus, or 11 miles east of Auburn, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, De Witt, Sullivan, North Syracuse, Solvay, Chittenango, Manlius, Fayetteville and Minoa. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 34A and 38. New York Interstate 81 between 16A and 29 South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
